title: Simple Features collection of NYC Zip Codes — nyc_zip_sf
NYC Zip Codes — nyc_zips
text: Table New York City zip codes.

title: NYC Zip Codes — nyc_zips
text: data frame 255 rows 7 columns: zip Zip Code borough Borough name city Nominal city (USPS designation) county County 'Countyname County' long_county County 'Countyname County, New York' short_county County 'County' po_name Nominal post office (USPS designation)

title: NYC Zip Codes — nyc_zips
text: Full USPS Zip Code list https://postalpro.usps.com/ZIP_Locale_Detail Initial regional subsetting via https://worldpopulationreview.com/zips/new-york
